title: Remove the Terms & Conditions print/PDF link and revert the app to the previous behavior

requirements.text: Remove the website link from the Step 3 Terms and Conditions print/PDF proof content so that no custom link is printed at the end of the document, restoring the prior (link-free) proof layout.

quotes: jo link bole the wo nikal do aur pahele jasa he app bana do

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/features/registration/steps/StepTermsAndConditions.tsx`, the print-only proof content no longer renders the hardcoded anchor link `http://star-maharashtra-galaxy-network`.
When using “Print / Save Proof”, the generated print/PDF content does not include `http://star-maharashtra-galaxy-network` anywhere in the document body.
The on-screen Step 3 Terms and Conditions UI remains functional and continues to allow printing after the user checks the agreement checkbox.

requirements.text: Ensure the Step 3 print flow remains safe and does not leak the deployment URL or any `caffeineAdminToken` hash fragments in printed/PDF content, while keeping the app behavior consistent with how it worked before the recent link-related change.

quotes: jo link bole the wo nikal do aur pahele jasa he app bana do

acceptanceCriteria: The print flow continues to call `sanitizeUrlForPrint('caffeineAdminToken')` before opening the print dialog and during the print lifecycle.
The printed/PDF document body does not include the deployment URL (e.g., `https://decisive-scarlet-bm7-draft.caffeine.xyz`) or any `#caffeineAdminToken=...` fragment.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI component sources).
Do not edit immutable hook files under `frontend/src/hooks/` listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
No backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not remove the existing Terms & Conditions “Print / Save Proof” feature.
Do not add new admin/authentication features.
Do not introduce any external integrations (email/SMS/third-party auth).
